songs.title: 10 Steps and Draw
songs.lyrics:
I’m the wickedest nigga
That you ever ran across
Mind up a crime boss
That’s down to set it off
Like Latifa
You got up a slug
Is how I greet ya
A face to face encounter
With the grim reaper
Meet the
Gangs that I kicks from this cannon
I’m the illest
LIie Bruce Willis
The last man standing
One by one I’ll watch your whole clique vanish
Walk the phone
And let my dancing eagles do the damage
That’s how I push down
In broad daylight
We’ll even spit on your tombstone
At your gravesite

Yeah
Ain't no love for those who aoppose
I leagve them stiffen bros
With them tags on they toes
Yeah!

And all we left behind
Was blood stains
Another brother who became a victim
Of this dirty gang
Watch him die from ten slugs to the chest
We put suckas to rest
In the wild wild west

Bitch nigga
Ifyou think you raw
Fool take ten steps and draw
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
Ten steps and draw


Bitch nigga
Ifyou think you raw
Fool take ten steps and draw
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
Ten steps and draw

Ten steps and draw
It’s the theory
My local fokel
Told me the shit more eerie
You take ten steps to die
I lie I took two steps
Turned around and let them fly

Pulled the ADIDAS grip
I’m dipping with the heater
Down with Cuicide who
Permits with homicide
Do they call a doctor
Fuck ‘em let ‘em ride
You don’t need a hoe
You six feet inside


Now I intervene
My power in a beef
Is  like a thief in the night
Bitch nigga I bet your life
So what you gonna do now
To Cuicide he done that
For all a hoe for shits the paints
Don’t even run that

Gangstas split
Blast you with my sun Gat
Heat seeking hollow
Cocked and coming at your hat
I bet that made you melt
Like a candle
The hip hop vandal
Played too hard for this mantle

Bitch  nigga
If you think you raw
Fool take ten steps and draw
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
Ten steps and draw

Bitch nigga
If  you think you raw
Fool take ten steps and draw
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
Ten steps and draw

If you respect my power
It’s forced to pit
You’re dealing with the Don
Deets so fuck your business
We’ll make you disappear easy
Release your spirit
You wanted problems?
Here’s the repercussions
Deal with it

Come from the school
Of hard knoccs
Like JayZ
The hub city
Abbreviated with the CPT
And that’s the location Where the shit goes down

Back in the day
We used to chuck ‘em
But we can last and then
We hit your block
Fix some shots like the Newport
Run off with a smile
The only way to find these Chinese
Called click click pow

I’m packing with
This forward shit
Gets deep and if you
Got beat pull my heat
Till that shit up
Goes cold in the streets
And we gonna a live
Till the day we die by it
Shit we kick
This real street life
Don't even try to deny it
The dawn calls the shots
Cuicide provides the muscle
Big Jess put us on the game
We gonna grind  and hustle

Bitch  nigga
If you think you raw
Fool take ten steps and draw
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
Ten steps and draw

Bitch nigga
If  you think you raw
Fool take ten steps and draw
1,2,3,4,5,6,7,8,9
Ten steps and draw

Ha!
